message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value representing the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I need to find the net profit figure, which represents the profit after all expenses have been deducted from revenue.

In the cash flow statement provided, I can see the "Net Profit" line item under "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" with a value of 1842166.21 on 2024-02-05.

This is the amount of profit the entity retained after all expenses, including operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization have been deducted from total revenue.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1842166.21'}}
```
